trans-unit.source: This app needs local network access when its integration features are configured accordingly.

trans-unit.id: If you deny these connections, the app will not send crash reports to the developer. Crash reporting is handled by Sentry (sentry.io).
trans-unit.source: If you deny these connections, the app will not send crash reports to the developer. Crash reporting is handled by Sentry (sentry.io).

trans-unit.id: If you deny these connections, you will not be able to purchase or activate a Pro license. Licensing is managed by Paddle (paddle.com).
trans-unit.source: If you deny these connections, you will not be able to purchase or activate a Pro license. Licensing is managed by Paddle (paddle.com).

trans-unit.id: If you deny these connections, you will not be notified about new versions and will not be able to update to newer app versions using the app's UI.
trans-unit.source: If you deny these connections, you will not be notified about new versions and will not be able to update to newer app versions using the app's UI.

trans-unit.id: You may create network based custom controls (for example to control a network-enabled device like a TV, ampliifer) in the app that can connect to any hosts you specify on your local network or over the Internet. If you deny these connections, these custom controls will not work.
trans-unit.source: You may create network based custom controls (for example to control a network-enabled device like a TV, ampliifer) in the app that can connect to any hosts you specify on your local network or over the Internet. If you deny these connections, these custom controls will not work.

trans-unit.id:
%@ must restart to apply the imported settings.
If you imported settings from a different installation, macOS display identifiers (UUIDs) may not match with this installation. As a result, various imported settings may not get immediately applied to the connected displays.
Use the 'Transfer display settings' feature under all affected display's additional settings to fix the identifier mismatch issue.
trans-unit.source:
%@ must restart to apply the imported settings.
If you imported settings from a different installation, macOS display identifiers (UUIDs) may not match with this installation. As a result, various imported settings may not get immediately applied to the connected displays.
Use the 'Transfer display settings' feature under all affected display's additional settings to fix the identifier mismatch issue.

trans-unit.id:
**%@ License Issue Detected**
This installation has been remotely deactivated, or the hardware identifiers have changed since the last license activation. This may have occurred due to a hardware upgrade or migration to a new device.
Please reactivate this installation to continue using Pro features.
trans-unit.source:
**%@ License Issue Detected**
This installation has been remotely deactivated, or the hardware identifiers have changed since the last license activation. This may have occurred due to a hardware upgrade or migration to a new device.
Please reactivate this installation to continue using Pro features.
trans-unit.target:
**%@ Licentieprobleem opgemerkt**
Deze installatie is op afstand uitgeschakeld of de apparatuur-identificatoren zijn gewijzigd sinds de laatste licentie-activering. Dit kan gebeurd zijn door bijvoorbeeld een hardware-upgrade of migratie naar een nieuw apparaat.
Activeer deze installatie opnieuw om de Pro-functies te kunnen blijven gebruiken.

trans-unit.id:
**%@ Outdated License**
The provided license was originally issued for an earlier version of %@ and has already been extended once with a complimentary upgrade to a subsequent major version.
This license no longer covers the current app version (v%@). To use this version of %@, please purchase a new license.
Thank you for your understanding and continued support.
trans-unit.source:
**%1$@ Outdated License**
The provided license was originally issued for an earlier version of %2$@ and has already been extended once with a complimentary upgrade to a subsequent major version.
This license no longer covers the current app version (v%3$@). To use this version of %4$@, please purchase a new license.
Thank you for your understanding and continued support.

trans-unit.source: A less than 720p desktop resolution is not ideal for macOS usability as GUI elements might not fit. This affects virtual screens as well as the resolution slider for displays.

trans-unit.id: A popup notification will appear when the app detects interference from other apps that adjust the color table. Useful for troubleshooting.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen is similar to a real display but exists only in the virtual space (in the computer's memory). You can use it to show it in a PIP window, stream or mirror its content to a real display or use it as a source for screen recording or screencast via an appropriate app.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen is similar to a real display but exists only in the virtual space (in the computer's memory). You can use it to show it in a PIP window, stream or mirror its content to a real display or use it as a source for screen recording or screencast via an appropriate app.
trans-unit.target: Een virtueel scherm lijkt op een echt scherm maar bestaat alleen in de virtuele ruimte (in het geheugen van de computer). Je kunt een virtueel scherm gebruiken om het te tonen in een PIP-venster, om het materiaal ervan te streamen naar een echt scherm of te gebruiken als Synchrone weergave naar een echt scherm, of je kunt het gebruiken als bron voor schermopname of een screencast via een bijbehorende app.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect or disconnect when the associated display is connected or disconnected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect or disconnect when the associated display is connected or disconnected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.target: Een virtueel scherm welke gekoppeld is aan een scherm zal automatisch verbinden of losmaken als het scherm dat er aan gekoppeld is wordt verbonden of losgemaakt. Je kunt het automatisch verbinden van gekoppelde virtuele schermen uitschakelen.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect when the associated display is connected. All other virtual screens were connected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect when the associated display is connected. All other virtual screens were connected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.target: Een virtueel scherm welke gekoppeld is aan een scherm zal automatisch verbinden als het scherm dat er aan gekoppeld is wordt verbonden. Alle andere virtuele schermen waren verbonden. Je kunt het automatisch verbinden van gekoppelde virtuele schermen uitschakelen.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically disconnect when the associated display is disconnected. All other virtual screens were disconnected. You can disable auto-disconnect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically disconnect when the associated display is disconnected. All other virtual screens were disconnected. You can disable auto-disconnect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.target: Een virtueel scherm welke gekoppeld is aan een scherm zal automatisch losmaken als het scherm dat er aan gekoppeld is wordt losgemaakt. Alle andere virtuele schermen waren losgemaakt. Je kunt het automatisch losmaken van gekoppelde virtuele schermen uitschakelen.

trans-unit.source: Defines the TCP port the built-in HTTP server listens to.

trans-unit.id: Defines the diagonal size the system perceives the display. If used for mirroring/streaming, it might optionally be matched to the target screen. Safe to leave empty as default. With custom resolution list of varying aspect ratios the actual reported size may be different.
trans-unit.source: Defines the diagonal size the system perceives the display. If used for mirroring/streaming, it might optionally be matched to the target screen. Safe to leave empty as default. With custom resolution list of varying aspect ratios the actual reported size may be different.

Als het wordt gebruikt voor synchrone weergave/streamen, dan kan deze mogelijk optioneel overeen worden gekomen met het doelscherm. Het is veilig om het standaard leeg te laten. Met een eigen resolutielijst met diverse beeldverhoudingen kan de werkelijk gemelde grootte afwijken.

trans-unit.id: Defines the lower bound of brightness control in nits. Use 0 to allow full continuous dimming to black.
trans-unit.source: Defines the lower bound of brightness control in nits. Use 0 to allow full continuous dimming to black.
trans-unit.target: Definieert de ondergrens van de helderheidsbediening in nits. Gebruik 0 om volledig doorlopende dimmen naar zwart mogelijk te maken.

trans-unit.id: Defines the number of logical steps in a fine adjustment step. By default, this equals one-quarter of a chiclet in the native macOS OSD (1 logical step).
trans-unit.source: Defines the number of logical steps in a fine adjustment step. By default, this equals one-quarter of a chiclet in the native macOS OSD (1 logical step).
trans-unit.target: Definieert het aantal logische stappen in een fijnafstellingsstap. Standaard komt dit overeen met een kwart van een blokje in de ingebouwde macOS-OSD (1 logische stap).

trans-unit.id: Defines the number of logical steps in a standard adjustment step. By default, this equals one full chiclet of the native macOS OSD (4 steps per chiclet; 16 chiclets × 4 steps = 64 total steps).
trans-unit.source: Defines the number of logical steps in a standard adjustment step. By default, this equals one full chiclet of the native macOS OSD (4 steps per chiclet; 16 chiclets × 4 steps = 64 total steps).
trans-unit.target: Definieert het aantal logische stappen in een fijnafstellingsstap. Standaard komt dit overeen met een kwart van een blokje in de ingebouwde macOS-OSD (4 stappen per blokje; 16 blokjes × 4 stappen = in totaal 64 stappen).

trans-unit.id:
⚠️ An EDID write operation modifies the EDID and DisplayID data on the device itself. Erroneous EDID data or a problem during EDID write might render the display permanently unusable!
Most displays do not allow EDID write for security reasons, some displays require EDID write to be activated in a service menu. Most EDID emulators or pass-thru dongles support EDID write. EDID write (if supported) usually works over HDMI.
trans-unit.source:
⚠️ An EDID write operation modifies the EDID and DisplayID data on the device itself. Erroneous EDID data or a problem during EDID write might render the display permanently unusable!
Most displays do not allow EDID write for security reasons, some displays require EDID write to be activated in a service menu. Most EDID emulators or pass-thru dongles support EDID write. EDID write (if supported) usually works over HDMI.
trans-unit.target:
⚠️ Een EDID-schrijfhandeling wijzigt de EDID en DisplayID-gegevens op het apparaat zelf. Foutieve EDID-gegevens of een probleem gedurende het schrijven van de EDID kan ervoor zorgen dat het apparaat permanent onbruikbaar wordt!
De meeste schermen staan het schrijven van EDID om beveiligingsredenen niet toe, sommige schermen vereisen dat het schrijven van EDID wordt ingeschakeld in een servicemenu. De meeste EDID-emulatoren of doorgifte-dongles ondersteunen het schrijven van EDID. Het schrijven van EDID (indien ondersteund) werkt meestal over HDMI.

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ For this XDR display it best to set calibration to Default - Auto Calibrate so the app can automatically adapt upscaling to the currently selected Apple Display Preset and environmental factors. For manual calibration set the brightness slider as high as possible while also making sure you still see the smiling face!
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ For this XDR display it best to set calibration to Default - Auto Calibrate so the app can automatically adapt upscaling to the currently selected Apple Display Preset and environmental factors. For manual calibration set the brightness slider as high as possible while also making sure you still see the smiling face!
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Voor dit XDR-scherm is het het beste om de kalibratie in te stellen op Standaard - Automatische kalibratie, zodat de app automatisch het opschalen kan aanpassen naar de momenteel geselecteerde voorinstelling van het Apple-scherm en omgevingsfactoren. Voor handmatige kalibratie stel je de schuifbalk Helderheid in op een zo hoog mogelijke waarde, terwijl je ook ervoor zorgt dat je het lachende gezicht blijft zien!

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ Full screen streaming is unavailable as it requires Screen Recording permissions. You can grant this under System Settings > Privacy & Security > Screen Recording!

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ If a third party app (like MediaMate) is being used to show the OSD, you might want to disable the built-in OSD under Keyboard/OSD to avoid having duplicated or mixed-style OSDs presented!
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ If a third party app (like MediaMate) is being used to show the OSD, you might want to disable the built-in OSD under Keyboard/OSD to avoid having duplicated or mixed-style OSDs presented!
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Als apps van derden (zoals MediaMate) worden gebruikt om de OSD te tonen, dan wil je mogelijk de ingebouwde OSD uitschakelen via Toetsenbord/OSD om te voorkomen dat je meerdere OSD’s of deze in een gemengde stijl ziet!

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ If you want to mirror/stream the virtual screen to a natively connected display only to get flexible HiDPI resolutions, it is recommended to use the flexible scaling feature instead if possible! If you want to use mirroring instead of streaming, this can be enabled in the app menu once the virtual screen was connected.
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ If you want to mirror/stream the virtual screen to a natively connected display only to get flexible HiDPI resolutions, it is recommended to use the flexible scaling feature instead if possible! If you want to use mirroring instead of streaming, this can be enabled in the app menu once the virtual screen was connected.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Als je het virtuele scherm wilt gebruiken voor Synchrone weergave of streamen naar uitsluitend een ingebouwd verbonden scherm om flexibele HiDPI-resoluties te krijgen, dan wordt het aanbevolen om, indien mogelijk, de flexibele schalingsfunctie te gebruiken! Als je alleen Synchrone weergave wilt gebruiken in plaats van streamen, dan kan dit worden ingeschakeld in het aapmens zodra het virtuele scherm verbonden is.
